sentences.english: In addition, the knockout mice might be useful as models to study mania.
sentences.chinese: 另外，该基因敲除小鼠可以作为研究躁狂症的模型。

sentences.english: To investigate the distribution and frequency of symptoms in manic- depressive disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查住院躁狂和抑郁症的症状分布和频度。

sentences.english: He had been struggling with bipolar disorder for a couple of years.
sentences.chinese: 最近几年他一直在和躁狂症做斗争。

sentences.english: Episodes of mania and depression typically recur across the life span.
sentences.chinese: 阶段性的躁狂和抑郁通常在一生中反复发作。

sentences.english: The kokle is the manic-depressive of the string family.
sentences.chinese: 叩叩琴可以说是弦乐器家族当中的躁狂抑郁症。

sentences.english: Manic depressives oscillate between depression and elation.
sentences.chinese: 患者抑郁与躁狂交替发作。

sentences.english: Objetive The aim of this paper was to observe the clinical efficacy of valproate magnesium in mania.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨丙戊酸镁抗躁狂症的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Valproate was FDA-approved in 1995 for treatment of mania.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，丙戌酸钠被FDA核准用于治疗躁狂。

sentences.english: Those trapped in sex mania will find long-awaited relief in No Stones.
sentences.chinese: 那些被困在性躁狂症会找到期待已久的减免没有乐队。

sentences.english: Objective To find the treatment of an old patient with manic by evidence-based medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的通过循证医学方法寻找治疗老年躁狂的方案。

sentences.english: To say that China is in the midst of a mania is obvious.
sentences.chinese: 把中国说成是在一场躁狂症是显而易见的。

sentences.english: Audley, and do you select me as the victim of your monomania?
sentences.chinese: 难道你选定我作你那躁狂症的牺牲品吗？

sentences.english: Hypomania is a feature of two mood disorders: bipolar II disorder and cyclothymia .
sentences.chinese: 轻躁狂是双向情感障碍II型与躁郁症的特征。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the family care burden of patients with depression and mania.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查抑郁症与躁狂症患者的家庭照料负担。

sentences.english: Hypomanics and manics generally have chaotic personal and professional relationships.
sentences.chinese: 轻度躁狂和躁狂患者的人际及职场关系，通常一团糟。

sentences.english: Hypomanics and manics generally have chaotic personal and professional relationships.
sentences.chinese: 轻度躁狂和躁狂患者的人际及职场关系，通常一团糟。
